name: dev-browser
creator: SawyerHood
description: Browser automation plugin that lets Claude control your web browser. Test and verify as you develop.

name: python-development
creator: wshobson
description: Python development with 3 specialized agents and 5 skills. Scaffolding, async patterns, testing.
examplePrompt: Set up a new Python project with async support

name: kubernetes-operations
creator: wshobson
description: K8s architect agent with 4 deployment skills. Production-grade Helm charts and GitOps.
examplePrompt: Create a Helm chart for my Node.js app

name: skill-creator
creator: anthropic
description: Interactive guide for creating new skills. Claude asks about your workflow and generates the structure.
examplePrompt: Help me create a skill for code review

name: mcp-builder
creator: anthropic
description: Guide for creating MCP servers to integrate external APIs and services with Claude Code.
examplePrompt: Build an MCP server for my weather API

name: devops-automation-pack
creator: jeremylongshore
description: Complete DevOps toolkit with CI/CD, deployment automation, and infrastructure management.
examplePrompt: Set up a GitHub Actions CI/CD pipeline

name: superpowers
creator: obra
description: 20+ battle-tested skills including TDD, debugging, and collaboration patterns. /brainstorm, /write-plan, /execute-plan.
examplePrompt: Use /brainstorm to generate ideas for my feature

name: webapp-testing
creator: anthropic
description: Test local web applications using Playwright for UI verification and debugging.
examplePrompt: Test the login flow on localhost:3000

name: docx
creator: anthropic
description: Create, edit, and analyze Word documents with tracked changes, comments, and formatting.
examplePrompt: Create a Word document with my meeting notes

name: xlsx
creator: anthropic
description: Create and edit Excel spreadsheets with formulas, charts, and formatting.
examplePrompt: Create a spreadsheet tracking monthly expenses

name: pptx
creator: anthropic
description: Create presentations with slides, layouts, and speaker notes.
examplePrompt: Create a presentation about Q4 results

name: pdf
creator: anthropic
description: Create and read PDF documents with text, images, and formatting.
examplePrompt: Convert this markdown to a formatted PDF

name: git-commit-smart
creator: jeremylongshore
description: Never write commit messages again. AI-powered conventional commits with context awareness.
examplePrompt: Commit my changes with a smart message
